text:
Running windows XP with all hotfixes and the .NET SDK (not sure if this helps).
Intel Celeron 445 box, aopen board.

Just did a straight install - everything - apache does not run.

I have a firewall installed (high speed connection) - but I did disable the 
firewall and even tried making a rule for the IP/port but nothing to get it to 
work!

Thank you,
Franco 

From error log:
[Wed Apr 17 00:50:47 2002] [notice] Parent: Created child process 2440
[Wed Apr 17 00:50:48 2002] [notice] Child 2440: Child process is running
[Wed Apr 17 00:50:48 2002] [crit] (32538)An operation was attempted on 
something that is not a socket.  : Parent: WSADuplicateSocket failed for 
socket 3309504. Check the FAQ.
[Wed Apr 17 00:50:48 2002] [crit] (22609)The pipe has been ended.  : 
setup_inherited_listeners: Unable to read socket data from parent
[Wed Apr 17 00:50:48 2002] [crit] (32538)An operation was attempted on 
something that is not a socket.  : master_main: create child process failed. 
Exiting.
[Wed Apr 17 00:50:48 2002] [notice] Parent: Forcing termination of child 
process 3316968 

Thank you,
Franco Magliaro
creator: hardworker@magliaro.com
slive@apache.org
